name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Shape Shifter

skills.name: Thudding Calamity
skills.desc: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Thunder-Shock
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishing Bolts
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Mara-Summon
skills.desc: Consumes HP to summon Mara-Struck Soldier

skills.name: Vigor Draining
skills.desc: When there are other friendly units with Rebirth on the field, they have Draining Hit. When hitting a target, they will restore HP.
